# epilot-opportunity_opportunity (Resource)

Opportunity Resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "epilot-opportunity_opportunity" "my_opportunity" {
  current_task      = "open"
  opportunity_title = "...my_opportunity_title..."
  source_type       = "manual"
  status            = "open"
}
```
